Sentencas: Thermodynamic stability of CaZrO3 with respect to LaCrO3 was investigated.
Titulo: Thermodynamic stability of LaCrO3 and CaZrO3 using a solid-state galvanic cell method

Sentencas: The possible products of the reaction are La2Zr2O7 and CaCr2O4.
Titulo: Thermodynamic stability of LaCrO3 and CaZrO3 using a solid-state galvanic cell method

Sentencas: The standard Gibbs free energy change for this reaction at T = 1273 K was calculated.
Titulo: Thermodynamic stability of LaCrO3 and CaZrO3 using a solid-state galvanic cell method

Sentencas: To this purpose the standard Gibbs free energy of formation (from oxides) of LaCrO3, CaZrO3, La2Zr2O7 and CaCr2O4 were obtained from the measurements of electromotive force (EMF) of respective solid-state galvanic cells.
Titulo: Thermodynamic stability of LaCrO3 and CaZrO3 using a solid-state galvanic cell method

Sentencas: LaCrO3 was confirmed to be able to react with CaZrO3 spontaneously.
Titulo: Thermodynamic stability of LaCrO3 and CaZrO3 using a solid-state galvanic cell method

Sentencas: However, the solid solutions based on LaCrO3, in which the activity of LaCrO3 at T = 1273 K reached the values below 0.168, are thermodynamically stable with respect to CaZrO3.
Titulo: Thermodynamic stability of LaCrO3 and CaZrO3 using a solid-state galvanic cell method
